gameelements
Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      gameelements.GameBoard

public class GameBoard
extends java.util.Observable

Represents the layout of the game board used during the whole duration of a game. It is used for the context of the game situations that will be created during the game. All situations during a game will share the same dimensions, that are defined by the game board.

          Constructs a game board for the given dimensions.

manageOverflows

void manageOverflows(GameSituation situation,
                     Position startPos,
                     boolean display)
Triggers overflows, if any overflowing fields exist. Notifies observers about any state change of the situation.

Parameters:
situation - the current game situation.
startPos - the position form where to start with overflows.
display - if true, gui will be notified, else no notifications.
